location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham, Council at Bussora (Basra) John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter reports the arrival of the RevengeCommander Robert Freeman Gage and discusses matters related to woolens in detail. An additional note reports sales of woolens and cloth worth 23,000 rupees. Shipped by Jumma Carack Boat.
